=Project installation=
1. Install SDL with SDL_ttf and SDL_img. You can find it at http://www.libsdl.org/cgi/viewvc.cgi/trunk/
2. Install SDL_gfx, from http://www.ferzkopp.net/Software/SDL_gfx-2.0/SDL_gfx-2.0.20.tar.gz
3. Install SVN client.
4. Download sources as mentioned in page http://code.google.com/p/runningram/source/checkout
5. Type make in download dir.
6. Run and enjoy.

P.S. If you want to change project, the most suitable way is to install netBeans, and open project file from it.
